programme.title: Beat Shazam S3
programme.desc: Beat Shazam is an interactive musical game show based on the Shazam app, in which teams compete against each other attempting to identify songs.

programme.title: Just for Laughs Gags S21
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S5
programme.desc: Returning season of the classic game show, hosted by Michael Strahan. With the help of their game partners, contestants paired with celebrities must guess words or phrases that appear on the show's pyramid-shaped gameboard to win money.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S38
programme.desc: (Encore) This gameshow features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal USA S5
programme.desc: One of America's most popular and beloved game shows, Deal or No Deal, is back with its iconic host Howie Mandel.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S7
programme.desc: The Great British Bake Off is the ultimate baking battle where passionate amateur baking competitors, young and old, from every background and every corner of Britain attempts to impress the judges through their baking prowess to be crowned the UK's Best Amateur Baker.

programme.title: Magic Adventures: The Crystal of Dark
programme.desc: A young princess Olivia is transported to many wondrous lands and along the way she teams up with allies. Together they embark on a dangerous quest to find 4 great wizards and 7 magic crystals that will help her stop the Dark wizard and save her parents, and they learn that real magic is having good virtues of courage, friendship, and cooperation.

programme.title: Pokemon the Series: Sun & Moon - Ultra Legends S22
programme.desc: This season follows the final adventures of Ash Ketchum and his classmates at the Pokemon school in the Alola region.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S2
programme.desc: A monster truck and his human driver go on adventures together while learning about science, technology, engineering and math.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3
programme.desc: Go Jetters go bigger as our plucky international heroes Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz, together with their disco-grooving mentor Ubercorn, discover lots more about our world. And we learn much more about each of the Go Jetters too. Travelling from the top of the planet to the very bottom, their action-packed adventures take them to truly incredible places. And there's a good chance Grandmaster Glitch has got there first to cause his usual chaos!

programme.title: Counting With Paula S5
programme.desc: Imagine being the odd one out because you look different. That's how Uncle Sphinx felt without a nose. The children set out to make him a nose so he'll fit in, but things didn't turn out the way Uncle Sphinx had hoped for. The children go in search of the Golden Jasmine Flower on Treasure Island. But Captain Redbeard really wants to get his hands on it first! Will he succeed?

programme.title: Titipo the Little Train S2
programme.desc: Maintenance trains Fix and Lift are best friends like no other in the train village. One day, while they are practicing for a singing contest, they get into an argument about who's better at singing....

programme.title: Sesame Street S49
programme.desc: Catch a brand new segment called "Abby's Amazing Adventures". And look out for special appearances by celebrity guests like Whoopi Goldberg, Zooey Deschanel, Amanda Seyfried and Blake Lively.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S6
programme.desc: Led by a boy named Ryder, a team of six playful rescue dogs use their individual talents to protect the seaside town of Adventure Bay. The pups are occasionally joined by newer helpers: Cap'n Turbot, Robo-Dog, Everest, and Tracker.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: Ollipolis' reigning cat show champion, Jinxy, has a new rival in the form of The Imp's suspicious looking new cat. When Jinxy gets hurt, Rover has to step in to avenge his feline friend. Rover takes up a new online persona and extreme sports to impress his online crush. But he goes a little too extreme.

programme.title: Mush-Mush & the Mushables Part 2
programme.desc: While they are enjoying the longest day of the summer, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit realise that the forest is drying out. Worried, Mushpot explains to our friends that the Tree of Life, that regenerate the entire forest, is dying! There is only one Mushable who could help Mushpot to save the forest: Starmush. But the Mushelders haven't gotten along for years. Will they be able to put their differences aside in order to save the Tree of Life before it's too late?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S2
programme.desc: A monster truck and his human driver go on adventures together while learning about science, technology, engineering and math.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France Special
programme.desc: Beginning in Paris, Luke circumnavigates the country: Paris to Strasbourg, Lyon to Marseille, Nice to Biarritz and finally Ile d'Olron to St Malo. Luke's passion for cooking leads him to unearth a side to French food culture and lifestyle that has rarely been presented. Local characters open their homes and share family recipes with Luke.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: James works up the nerve to ask Ananya out on a proper date. Nathan confronts the ghosts of his past mistakes and Jessica finally takes revenge for Adam.

programme.title: Take That: Odyssey - Greatest Hits Tour (2019)
programme.desc: Relive the magic of Take That's spectacular 30th Anniversary live show. Take That - Odyssey - Greatest Hits Tour captures the band's incredible sell out tour at their Cardiff Principality Stadium show. Featuring some of the biggest hits from the band's amazing 30-year career plus some very special guests.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry: Willy Wonka & The Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: The classic Roald Dahl tale gets a modern twist when Tom and Jerry enter the amazing world of Willy Wonka's Chocolate Factory.

programme.title: Zero Hero
programme.desc: A weekly half hour series revolving around a Singaporean superhero family, The Magnificent Heroes, who have mysteriously lost all their super powers and now struggle to be like the average human being. Facing daily problems of homework, rudeness, pollution, office politics, busybody neighbours, bullying, peer pressure, relationships, the list is endless. Every week, a super villain from their past resurfaces, and it's up to our superheroes with no super powers to foil them.

programme.title: Life: First Steps
programme.desc: Of all nature's babies, single kids have the most to learn. In this episode biologist Patrick Aryee discovers the sacrifices their parents make to raise them - and how for these youngsters, a long time spent learning in early life means they're fully equipped with the skills they'll need to survive as adults.

programme.title: The LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: Lego Duplo invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced 25min evergreen finished series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: European mercenaries searching for black powder become embroiled in the defense of the Great Wall of China against a horde of monstrous creatures. Directed by Zhang Yimou.

My Little Pony Equestria Girls Special: Forgotten Friendship
programme.desc: Sunset Shimmer discovers that her friends' memories of her have been mysteriously erased; she promptly returns to Equestria where she reunites with her former mentor Princess Celestia and seeks help from Princess Twilight Sparkle to find the cause before the memories vanish forever.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S25 Special: Race For The Sodor Cup
programme.desc: Super-fast Kana is convinced that her speed is all she needs to win the Race for the Sodor Cup, a competition that draws engines from all over the world. However, when a racing practice gone wrong causes her partner, Kenji, to get hurt, Kana ends up paired with Thomas. Kana and Thomas will discover that it takes teamwork to become the best racers they can be, but is it enough to defeat the international champions and win the Sodor Cup?

programme.title: Paw Patrol Mighty Pups Special
programme.desc: In this high-flying, heroic mission, the PAW Patrol are given Mighty Pup powers after a mysterious meteor lands in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: My Little Pony: A New Generation
programme.desc: Friendship has been replaced by fear in Equestria. Sunny, an Earth pony, and Izzy, a unicorn, embark on an adventure that takes them to faraway lands and challenges them to make new friends as they strive to restore harmony to Equestria.

programme.desc: The Dragon Warrior has to clash against the savage Tai Lung as China's fate hangs in the balance. However, the Dragon Warrior mantle is supposedly mistaken to be bestowed upon an obese panda who is a novice in martial arts.

programme.title: Life: First Steps
programme.desc: Having brothers and sisters can be tough, especially when you're competing for survival. In this episode biologist Patrick Aryee discovers why some of the most successful animals on earth grow up with siblings. And why for some parents, having more than one offspring is the perfect insurance policy.

programme.title: Once Upon A Hero (Zero Hero Telemovie)
programme.desc: It's been one year since The Magnificent Heroes saved Singapore from Captain Chaoszzz's evil regime. But things are about to change with the appearance of a new, evil and powerful villain, Doomsday Clock. Equipped with powerful abilities, this mysterious masked villain wreaks havoc across the nation; freezing time, cutting off technology and even breaking Captain Chaoszzz, Pink Piranha and Disgusto out of prison.

programme.title: My Little Pony Equestria Girls Special: Rollercoaster of Friendship
programme.desc: Rarity takes a summer job as a costume designer for a new amusement park to which this hinders her friendship with the other girls, particularly Applejack.

programme.title: Paw Patrol Ready Race Rescue!
programme.desc: When legendary racer the Whoosh can't compete at the Adventure Bay 500, Marshall and the heroic pups shift into high gear for a new mission.

programme.title: True And The Rainbow Kingdom Specials
programme.desc: When searching for the perfect Wuzzle Wegg, Bartleby thinks he sees a monster. Will the Rainbow King have to cancel Wuzzle Wegg Day?

programme.title: Sesame Street S48
programme.desc: Catch a brand new segment starring Cookie Monster in "Cookie Monster's Foodie Truck". And look out for special guest appearances by international Sesame Street characters Chamki (from Galli Galli Sim Sim), Lily (from Zhima Jie: Da Niao Kan Shijie) and Zuzu (from Takalani Sesame).

programme.title: Lil Wild Special
programme.desc: It's holiday season and the zoo has a new addition - Kwong, a brash all action pangolin. Watch as the Lil Wild gang tackle the chaos that ensues, and learns to adjust to the latest addition of their pack. This onetime episode will also include the exciting release of three new songs performed by local artistes like ShiGGa Shay, Estelle Fly, and YAO.

programme.title: LEGO Monkie Kid Special 2
programme.desc: The ancient and evil Spider Queen emerges from her lair. With the help of a "shadowy" figure, the Spider Queen is SUPERCHARGED, using her power to capture Monkey King and Demon Bull King. It's up to MK and his team to track down ingredients for an antidote to cure the citizens and free the city.

programme.title: The Rose Parade's New Year Celebration 2022
programme.desc: The Rose Parade is a celebration held in California, US. It is more than a century old a festival of flowers, music and sports unequaled anywhere else in the world. It's America's New Year Celebration, a greeting to the world on the first day of the year, and a salute to the community spirit and love of pageantry that have thrived in Pasadena for more than 100 years.

programme.title: The Brit Awards 2021
programme.desc: Featuring exclusive performances by some of the greatest artists from Britain and around the world, The BRIT Awards is known for its unique collaborations and stunning showcases. The British public will once again be able to vote for their Best British Single live on the night and The BRITs Academy will decide which mix of home-grown musical talent and global stars to honour with a coveted BRIT trophy.

programme.title: Looney Tunes: Rabbit's Run
programme.desc: Lola Bunny invents a perfume with the adverse effect of turning people invisible, sending her and cab driver Bugs Bunny on the run from the FBI, while another shady group seeks the formula.

programme.title: Life: First Steps
programme.desc: Success in the natural world is a gamble. From turtle hatchings making their epic dash to the sea, to praying mantises who, born with up to one hundred other nymphs, have to quickly protect themselves from not only predators, but also each other! In this episode biologist Patrick Aryee discovers why for some parents producing as many offspring as possible is the only way to ensure at least some of their babies will survive into adulthood.

programme.title: Playing With Fire
programme.desc: A crew of rugged firefighters meet their match when attempting to rescue three rambunctious kids.

programme.desc: Chichi the puppy is being taken care of by Mr.Herb and the little trains and lives with them at the train village. But Mr.Herb is worried because Chichi's mischiefs are getting worse by the day....

programme.desc: Cherry's new lemonade stand is hugely popular in Ollipolis. So popular that it attracts competition from The Imp! Can the trio stop The Imp from sabotaging their business and stealing Cherry's secret formula? Ollie is filming his first ever internet art video for all his fans and he's nervous. He doesn't think he's Internet-worthy. But when a mysterious hairdresser shows up to give Ollie a star makeover, will that be the end of Ollie's art video...

programme.title: Mush-Mush & the Mushables Part 2
programme.desc: Mush-Mush wants to impress the Mushlets by showing off his sensing gift. But his sense-foot doesn't work like it should. This is a disaster! And when Mushpot explains that some Mushables have to wait until they become Mushups to see their gifts fully developed, Mush-Mush is frustrated. He wants to master his gift now! Mush-Mush discovers that the solution he's looking for might be in The Dark Dark Forest. Mush-Mush decides to take his friends Chep and Lilit on a little trip...

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: In the sixth episode of Luke Nguyen's France, Luke journeys to Marseille, the capital of Provence, where he immerses himself in the city's food and art culture. Luke hitches a ride to the local fish market with Marseille restaurateur, Georgina. With ingredients fresh off the boat, the pair draws a crowd cooking Georgina's fusion African-French fish soup beside the old port.

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking And Carry On
programme.desc: Jamie brings us his most ingenious, delicious ways to use up those kitchen cupboard staples and back-of-the- freezer forgotten finds. He teaches us how to make great use of what we already have in our fridges and cupboards, and where we can make swaps in recipes when we have missing ingredients. More pragmatic and enjoyable than ever, Jamie demonstrates simple ways to make surprisingly delicious meals out of pantry classics.

programme.desc: Cody Rock and the Quest for MacGuvitonium revolves around Cody, a lonely twelve-year old boy who comes across an alien boy from the far off planet of Nee'La. He affectionately names the alien boy Arbie, who owns an amazing device called the GIZMO. Cody soon discovers that the GIZMO not only allows his new friend to gather data, but also gives Arbie superhuman abilities. The two boys soon become fast friends.

programme.desc: New season of the popular and fun gameshow. Volunteers from Ellen's studio audience play her outrageously fun games including Danger Word, Oh Ship!, Mt. Saint Ellen, Don't Leave Me Hanging, Know or Go and more for the chance to win $100,000!

Amateur performers present their singing, dancing, comedy and novelty acts to celebrity judges and a nationwide audience in order to advance in the competition and win a huge prize.

programme.title: Future Proof
programme.desc: Alan time travels back to 1965 to ensure that his father Seng Lee ends up with his mother Maggie on that fateful day during the MacDonald House bombing. Meanwhile, sparks fly unexpectedly between Alan and his mother's best friend, Veronica, while another danger lurks close by for Yusof.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted S2
programme.desc: FBI: MOST WANTED is a high-stakes drama that focuses on the Fugitive Task Force, an elite unit that relentlessly pursues and captures the notorious criminals on the Bureau's Most Wanted list. The team searches for a young woman who is heading down a deadly path of vengeance, using ties to an online radical conspiracy organization to further her cause.

programme.title: Heroes & Survivors : Defying Death S2
programme.desc: In these desperate situations, the heroic hand of a stranger may be the difference between life and death for someone. Sometimes, in these extreme situations, it can simply be the superhuman spirit that keeps a person alive. All of these stories of bravery, defiance and heroic acts come from people confronted with extreme and death-defying situations around the globe. From skiers buried alive in snow, to towns hit by a flash flood and unexpected tornadoes, these are tales of survival.

programme.title: 最好的我们
programme.desc: (PG) 每个人的心里大概都藏着一个念念不忘的人。一个偶然被提及的名字，让女摄影师耿耿（何蓝逗饰）内心掀起万千波澜，触动了回忆的开关，那个撩人心动的少年余淮（陈飞宇饰）再度闯进她的思绪。那是记忆里最好的时光，“学渣”耿耿和“学霸”余淮成了同桌，还结识了简单（王初伊饰）、贝塔（周楚濋饰）、徐延亮（陈帅饰）。校园里充盈着专属少男少女们的懵懂、青涩、怦然心动和勇敢，耿耿余淮也拥有了他们的约定。高考后，当耿耿满怀期待憧憬约定兑现之时，余淮却忽然消失不见了。七年后两人重逢，余淮当年未说出口的那句话、他不辞而别的秘密.

programme.title: P 风暴
programme.desc: (PG13-暴力镜头) 廖雨萍（周秀娜饰）向廉政公署举报富二代曹元元（林峯饰）在狱中行贿惩教人员。陆志廉（古天乐饰）以囚犯身份入狱调查，他的搭档程德明（郑嘉颖饰）和好友兼香港警方联合财富情报组总督察刘保强（张智霖饰）则在监狱外面接应陆。监狱危机四伏，在五年前被陆志廉亲手抓进监牢的前警司黄文彬（林家栋饰）已是狱中一大帮派，对陆伺机复仇；收受曹元元贿款的惩教署监督沈国强（谭耀文饰）更对狱中帮派斗争视而不见，令陆志廉一度重伤入院。陆回到监狱，幸得性格滑头的狱友王蓝禄（张继聪饰）帮助，背水一战。.

programme.title: 武林怪兽
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面)(重) 明朝万历年间，东厂督主孙玉鹤奉命捉拿怪兽。与此同时，义军少侠甄剑和师妹熊娇娇、侠女冷冰冰合谋聚集了一帮绿林好汉，意欲劫取官银救贫。可是官银不翼而飞，迎来的是朝廷钦犯封四海、浪子武柏等人。更大的危机还在于，怪兽也来到了他们身边，而且正在窥视着他们….

programme.title: 老字号
programme.desc: (重) 多元种族与文化的新加坡，当然也集合各种籍贯与风俗的美食和食品，有些也已经存在好几十年。虽然这些老店陈旧不变、地点偏僻、毫不起眼，但这些店却能屹立不倒。到底这间老店有什么魅力和鲜为人知的故事呢？主持人许振荣与谢韵仪将带你去找出他们成功的奥秘。.

programme.title: 极件任务

programme.title: 小公主
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 每个人的心里大概都藏着一个念念不忘的人。一个偶然被提及的名字，让女摄影师耿耿（何蓝逗饰）内心掀起万千波澜，触动了回忆的开关，那个撩人心动的少年余淮（陈飞宇饰）再度闯进她的思绪。那是记忆里最好的时光，“学渣”耿耿和“学霸”余淮成了同桌，还结识了简单（王初伊饰）、贝塔（周楚濋饰）、徐延亮（陈帅饰）。校园里充盈着专属少男少女们的懵懂、青涩、怦然心动和勇敢，耿耿余淮也拥有了他们的约定。高考后，当耿耿满怀期待憧憬约定兑现之时，余淮却忽然消失不见了。七年后两人重逢，余淮当年未说出口的那句话、他不辞而别的秘密，耿耿能否得到解答。这段耿耿于怀的过往，让两人再度面临情感的抉择。.

programme.title: 完美搭档
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 世河（申河均饰）是一名肢体残疾人，他在年幼时遇到了意外，脊椎受损导致了肢体瘫痪。母亲去世后，他被亲戚送到福利院，在那里遇到了有智力障碍还被人欺负的东九（李光洙饰）。一天，轮椅失控使世河掉进了河里，东九冲进河里救回了世河，从此，毫无血缘关系的两人开始互帮互助，共同生活了20年的漫长时光，逐渐成为了心灵相融的“特别的兄弟”。然而，两人生活的福利机构“责任之家”面临着关闭危机，兄弟俩也将因此分离。为守护“责任之家”和两人的兄弟之情，世河开始了自己的守卫计划。.

programme.title: 安家
programme.desc: (PG) 似锦对大家讲述了自己的经历，众人都从中受益匪浅感慨万千。鱼化龙也从沮丧的情绪里走出来重新打起精神燃起斗志，大家一起为鱼化龙唱生日歌。就在这时赵小姐再次打电话过来要求看房，鱼化龙高兴地出了门。当晚赵小姐夫妇就签下买房合同，鱼化龙终于完成人生第一单。鱼化龙心中百感交集。隔天谢亭丰就带着客户看苏天培家里的房子。赵小姐从中帮忙说了很多好话，客户对房屋中介的话还心存疑虑，但听邻居对房子和环境的评价深信不疑。谢亭丰这天进门店收起房似锦和徐文昌店长的名牌，然后劝他们二人出去溜达。谢亭丰说一会儿苏天培的妈妈要和.

programme.title: 安家
programme.desc: (PG) 房似锦不解地问徐文昌为什么老洋房看房跟平常看房不一样，徐文昌解释了原因。房似锦听到徐文昌的解释感到受益匪浅。徐文昌这时告诉房似锦，龚家花园没有涉及其它纠纷，是老洋房里情况最简单的，如果徐文昌要做自己就放手让房似锦去做。房似锦喜出望外。房似锦带毛先生等几个客户一起看房，结果他们刚进院子就从房子里拥出一大群人。这群人领头的是个老太太，老太太怒骂房似锦没经过自己同意就来看房。房似锦从未见过这些人，她惊惶失措地不知如何是好。客户怒斥房似锦欺骗他们来看房，客户们愤然离开。房似锦赶紧打电话给龚先生，龚先生匆.

programme.title: 安家
